text: Iñaki Azkuna Urreta (14 February 1943 - 20 March 2014) was a Spanish politician of the Basque Nationalist Party. From 1999 until his death, he was mayor of the city of Bilbao, Biscay in the Basque Country. In 2012, he won the World Mayor Prize, honoring the most outstanding mayors in the world. He was born in Durango, Biscay. Azkuna died from prostate cancer on 20 March 2014 in Bilbao, Biscay. He was 71 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Iñaki Azkuna at City Mayors Category:1943 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Spain Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:Spanish mayors
title: Iñaki Azkuna
